sentences.en: A scuffle broke out between the two teams.
And she put her small hand upon his and a little scuffle ensued.
sentences.cn: 于是她把小手儿按在他手上,两个人争了一会儿.

sentences.en: But that was just a scuffle and exchange of words.
sentences.cn: 不过,那也只是扭打对骂而已.

sentences.en: He was jostled and pushed to the ground in the scuffle, Xinhua said.
sentences.cn: 新华说, 冲突中,他被暴徒推搡在地上.

sentences.en: I don't know how It'started ; in any case , there was a brief scuffle.
sentences.cn: 我不知道是怎么开始的, 反正发生了一场短暂的混战.

sentences.en: In the hallway outside, a scuffle of feet . A clink of metal.
sentences.cn: 在走廊外面, 有扭打的痕迹和金属发出的声音.

sentences.en: Late last year, three Chinese shoppers trampled to death in a supermarket scuffle over cooking oil.
sentences.cn: 去年底, 中国有三人在超市抢购食用油时被踩踏而死.

sentences.en: Police scuffled with some of the protesters.
sentences.cn: 警察和一些抗议者打了起来。

sentences.en: Scuffles broke out between rival supporters during the match.
sentences.cn: 比赛过程中，双方球迷之间发生了打斗。

sentences.en: Suddenly, an explosion inside the pot, and Zhang Yong is a scuffle between a moment together.
sentences.cn: 突然, 场内炸开了锅, 和张勇片刻间已是扭打在一起.

sentences.en: That night Jane listens scuffle and a cry for help in the room only above ITs.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上,简?爱听见从她上层的那个房间里传来扭打声和呼救声.

sentences.en: The drunken men started to scuffle.
sentences.cn: 这一群喝醉的人开始混战.

sentences.en: The gruff ruffian's ruffled cuff is scuffed in the scuffle with the shuffler.
sentences.cn: 在与洗牌者的混战中,粗暴暴徒的皱袖口被磨破.

sentences.en: The two men quarrelled and there was a scuffle.
sentences.cn: 那两个人争吵扭打起来.

sentences.en: Their scuffle was stopped by the riot police.
sentences.cn: 他们的殴斗被防暴警察制止了.

sentences.en: Then the hens scuffle under verandah, the cock ruffles his featITs on guard.
sentences.cn: 然后母鸡笨拙地走到廊檐下, 公鸡竖起羽毛,保卫她们.

trans.tran_cn: 扭打，混战，拖脚行走，拖步，拖着脚走的声音
trans.tran_en: a short fight that is not very violent
a short fight that is not very violent
